donate.blurb: I love open source with a passion, however development takes time and it's hard to allocate time without income. So if you use my software and find it usefull, please consider showing your support by donating.

books.title: Books
books.description: Some of the things I read recently

hobbies.blurb: Things I do and enjoy in my free time. While coding started out as a hobby and I still enjoy it, variety is good.

about.blurb: I'm freelance developer with over 5 years of experience, mainly with Python and Javascript, though I much prefer Typescript where possible.

apps.blurb: Applications I have written, some more popular than others. Maintenance and bugfixing are very time consuming, so unless I can generate some income from these, development will remain slow.

libs.blurb: Software libraries I've written and tend to use in my projects. These see much more use personally, so development is somewhat faster. Still, consider donating if you find them usefull.
